meanings.definition: A place or world depicted in a video game or movie.
meanings.sent1: In the videoland of the game, players can explore magical realms and defeat monsters.
meanings.sent2: The movie transported the audience to a futuristic videoland filled with advanced technology.
meanings.sent3: The characters in the video game got lost in the videoland and couldn't find their way back.
meanings.sent4: Her imagination turned the ordinary park into a colorful videoland of her own creation.
meanings.sent5: The vivid colors and detailed graphics made the videoland feel incredibly real.

meanings.definition: A company or business that specializes in renting or selling videos.
meanings.sent1: I visited the videoland to rent the latest action movie for the weekend.
meanings.sent2: The videoland on the corner has a wide selection of classic films for sale.
meanings.sent3: The videoland had a special offer on comedy movies, so I decided to stock up.
meanings.sent4: The videoland's shelves were filled with DVDs of all genres, making it a movie lover's paradise.
meanings.sent5: Walking into the videoland felt like stepping into a treasure trove of entertainment.
